source_question: 最近一段时间（下一个月），我的机遇该如何去把握？

localizations.name: 机遇-潜在机会
localizations.description: 分析下个月可能出现的机遇，以及它们的特点和潜在影响。
localizations.summary: 关注即将到来的机遇，了解它们的基本情况。

localizations.name: Fortune-Opportunities
localizations.description: Exploring external chances and possibilities that may come your way in the next month.
localizations.summary: Be open to new opportunities and keep an eye out for unexpected blessings.

dimension_key.aspect: 如何准备和行动以把握机遇

localizations.name: 机遇-准备与行动
localizations.aspect: 如何准备和行动以把握机遇
localizations.description: 探讨在识别到机遇后，如何做好准备工作，并采取适当的行动来把握这些机遇。
localizations.summary: 思考并制定策略，为把握机遇做好准备。

localizations.name: Decision-Seizing
localizations.description: Making proactive choices and taking decisive actions to make the most of the opportunities presented.
localizations.summary: Take bold steps and seize the moment to create positive outcomes.

dimension_key.aspect: 机遇把握后的结果及反馈

localizations.name: 机遇-结果与反馈
localizations.aspect: 机遇把握后的结果及反馈
localizations.description: 分析把握机遇后的可能结果，以及如何根据反馈调整未来的行动。
localizations.summary: 评估机遇把握后的效果，并据此调整未来的机遇把握策略。

localizations.name: Mindset-Optimism
localizations.description: Maintaining a positive and determined mindset to overcome challenges and manifest your goals.
localizations.summary: Believe in yourself, stay optimistic, and trust in your ability to succeed.

locales.question: 最近一段时间（下一个月），我的机遇该如何去把握？
locales.overall_summary: 通过分析潜在机遇、准备与行动策略以及结果与反馈，全面把握机遇并作出明智决策。

locales.question: In the upcoming period (next month), how should I seize my opportunities?
locales.overall_summary: In the next month, focus on being open to new opportunities, making bold decisions, and maintaining a positive mindset to seize the chances that come your way and manifest your goals effectively.
